name: A dark ring of jet-black stone
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'demon control'.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'summon demonic guardian'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It modifies the user's spell knowledge.
